A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A post-modernist pile of bantha poodoo\, which systematically deconstructs all elements of Star-Wars symbols and motifs\, while trying very hard to subvert your expectations\, by seemingly pulling plot twists straight from Edgar Walla's Plot Wheel.

I would not recommend this movie to anyone who values good storytelling and a coherent plot.

If you are not able to shut down your brain for the whole duration of the movie\, I would not recommend it.

Adding one star for nice looking imagery and decent musical score.
